items.sentence: I don\'t think that I deserved the punishment I got.
I don\'t think this is the best time to talk to Tom.
I fell in love with someone my parents didn\'t like.
It wasn\'t until this morning that Tom told me that.
Tom has a pretty good idea why Mary isn\'t here now.
Tom asked Mary if she knew when the concert started.
Tom asked Mary if she was planning to buy a new car.
Tom is married, has three kids, and lives in Boston.
Tom is practicing his speech in front of the mirror.
Tom is the only Canadian living in our neighborhood.
Tom knew Mary told John to ask Alice not to do that.
Tom continued working even though he was very tired.
Tom decided that it would be fun to try paragliding.
Tom asked Mary to help him with his science project.
Tom cut off a piece of meat and put it on his plate.
When was the last time you ate a home-cooked dinner?
I\'m tired of watching TV. Let\'s do something else.
I\'m very thankful for all that you\'ve done for me.
If you hadn\'t had my advice, you would have failed.
Tom has decided not to do anything about the matter.
